main_menu.title: ü§ñ System Prompt Management
main_menu.description: Welcome to the unified system prompt management interface! Please select the function to execute:
main_menu.main_functions_description:
‚Ä¢ **Set Prompt** - Set channel or server system prompt
‚Ä¢ **View Config** - View current system prompt configuration
‚Ä¢ **Module Edit** - Edit specific YAML module
‚Ä¢ **Copy Prompt** - Copy system prompt to other channels
‚Ä¢ **Remove Prompt** - Remove set system prompt
‚Ä¢ **Reset Config** - Reset system prompt configuration
main_menu.usage_description:
Click the buttons below to execute the corresponding function.
System supports three-layer inheritance: YAML base ‚Üí Server default ‚Üí Channel specific
main_menu.footer: Note: All operations will perform permission checks for security

menus.set_prompt_description: Please select the scope to set
menus.module_edit_description: Please select module and scope to edit
menus.copy_prompt_description: Please select source and target channels

success.copy_description: Successfully copied system prompt from #{from_channel} to #{to_channel}

info.modules_description: The following are YAML system prompt modules that can be overridden:
info.modules_usage: When setting system prompts, you can use module override functionality to customize specific modules

confirm.remove_channel: Are you sure to remove system prompt for channel #{channel}?
confirm.remove_server: Are you sure to remove server default system prompt?
confirm.reset_channel: Are you sure to reset system prompt for channel #{channel}?
confirm.reset_server: Are you sure to reset server default system prompt?
confirm.reset_all:
Are you sure to reset all system prompt settings?
‚ö†Ô∏è This operation cannot be undone!
confirm.copy_overwrite:
Copy system prompt from #{from_channel} to #{to_channel}
‚ö†Ô∏è Target channel already has system prompt, will be overwritten

validation.prompt_empty: ‚ùå System prompt content cannot be empty
validation.prompt_too_long: ‚ùå System prompt too long (max 4000 characters), current {length} characters
validation.same_channel: ‚ùå Source and target channels cannot be the same

errors.permission_denied: You do not have permission to perform this operation
errors.channel_permission_denied: You do not have permission to manage this channel's system prompt
errors.server_permission_denied: You do not have permission to manage server-level system prompt
errors.system_error: System error, please try again later
errors.unknown_error: Unknown error occurred, please try again later
errors.content_too_long: Content too long (current {length} characters, max {max} characters)
errors.server_only: This function can only be used within a server
errors.text_channel_only: This function can only be used in text channels
errors.internal_error: Internal error, please try again later

descriptions.base: Define AI's basic identity and core instructions, including bot name, creator info, etc.
descriptions.personality: Set AI's personality traits and expression style, including humor, politeness, language style, etc.
descriptions.answering_principles: Regulate AI's basic principles for answering questions, such as priority handling, source citation, etc.
descriptions.language: Set AI's language preference and expression, including main language, style elements, response length, etc.
descriptions.professionalism: Define AI's performance standards in professional topics, balancing humor and professionalism
descriptions.interaction: Set AI's interaction mode, including conversation style, focus management, etc.
descriptions.formatting: Regulate formatting rules in Discord environment, including Markdown syntax, mention formats, etc.
descriptions.professional_personality: Integrate professionalism and personalization settings to create a professional yet personalized AI performance
